{
  dataproduct(id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"){
    datasets{
      name
      description
      dataproductID
      keywords
      repo
      pii
      datasource {
          __typename
          ...on BigQuery {
              projectID
              dataset
              table
          }
      }
    }
  }
}

RETURNS
{
  "data": {
    "dataproduct": {
      "datasets": [
        {
          "name": "DatasetCreatedWithDataproduct",
          "description": "dataset created with dataproduct",
          "dataproductID": "{{ .dataproduct_id }}",
          "keywords": ["keyword1", "otherkeyword"],
          "repo": "somerepo",
          "pii": false,
          "datasource": {
              "__typename": "BigQuery",
              "projectID": "team-prod-4242",
              "dataset": "dataset1",
              "table": "table1"
          }
        },
        {
          "name": "DatasetWithPii",
          "description": "Description",
          "dataproductID": "{{ .dataproduct_id }}",
          "keywords": [],
          "repo": "somerepo",
          "pii": true,
          "datasource": {
              "__typename": "BigQuery",
              "projectID": "team-prod-4242",
              "dataset": "dataset1",
              "table": "table1"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
